column4: I'm trying to install my WUSB54GS wifi device with a tutorial that requires you compile ndiswrapper, but I can't seem to install the build-essentials package with apt-get.
Well, it's been a while since I did it, and I was being too stupid at the moment to record it, but it had something to do with not being able to find the disk.
Try using the Synaptic Package Manager
